name: Last Night At Home
description:
We conceived this game during the Global Game Jam 2019. We kept working on it for a month on our free time before releasing it. 

In this game, the player embodies a young woman spending the night alone in her apartment. Suddenly, something tries to entrer her home by making holes in the walls, which she has to patch until the police shows up...

Controls

WASD : move

Right click  : interact
